Message.Msg: agree, traded ex div. yesterday, should see suport levels in the low 40's

What I said a couple of days ago is based on the KO charts and not the stars! KO will move over the next couple of weeks and be in the range 41-43, as it will most likely cross the MA(50). Loading on the Sep calls 38.75 would be a great move!

KO share price is only 0.24 cents away from the MA50, crossing this from below is a very bullish move and typical the share price in the past has moved 5%-10% within few days. What all this means, in addition to the Buy confirmed signal, we are heading up very quickly to the 40's level in few days.
